Digital Assets is a utility to follow cryptocurrencies prices and statistics which integrates well with the GNOME desktop.
Utility
https://gitlab.gnome.org/fgrabenstaetter/digital-assets/raw/master/screenshot.png
What's new in this release:
Full GTK4 support
Improved user interface
Lot of code cleanup and project restructuring
Support of 22 new cryptos
What's new in this release:
Rework of API requests and better networking errors handling
New price up/down live indicator
Improved interface and charts
Support of 40+ new cryptos
Some fixes and performance improvements
What's new in this release:
Fixes and improvements of the ATH ratio and results with the ATH sort method
Allow to enable search by pressing any entry visible key
Remember the last selected currency and quote currency to activate them on the next app launch
Add Theta, ICON and USD Coin assets
Some fixes and performance improvements
